short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your background with Midnight Serenity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with Midnight Serenity, an extension that brings the calming beauty of a moonlit mountain landscape to your new tab page. The serene backdrop, featuring a tranquil lake reflecting the full moon, creates a peaceful atmosphere as you navigate the web. This extension also offers an optimized search bar, customizable shortcuts, and real-time weather and time updates, all seamlessly integrated into a visually stunning and functional interface. Perfect for those who appreciate a dark, elegant theme that enhances both focus and relaxation.
